item.title: Listen to your technology users — they have led to the most disruptive innovations in history
item.description: Technology users can be a source of ingenious ideas rather than a barrier. Here's how to seek out innovative disruption.

item.title: OpenAI has begun building out its robotics team
item.description: Previously, OpenAI partnered with robotics startup Figure to provide the models powering the latter's humanoid robots.

item.title: Google DeepMind researchers introduce new benchmark to improve LLM factuality, reduce hallucinations
item.description: Based on a new benchmark, Google DeepMind found Gemini 2.0 Flash to be the most factual LLM, with a score of 83.6%.

item.title: Researchers improved AI agent performance on unfamiliar tasks using ‘Dungeons and Dragons’
item.description: AgentRefine gives AI agents and models the ability to recognize errors and self-correct to work better for general tasks.

item.title: Breaking the data bottleneck: Salesforce’s ProVision speeds multimodal AI training with image scene graphs
item.description: Salesforce is using structured representation of image semantics to power programs that synthesize instruction datasets for AI training.
